product-info.opis: Medena barva za lase Subrina Charm vsebuje hranljivo in negovalno avokadovo olje, bogato z vitamini in esencialnimi maščobnimi kislinami, ki lase okrepi in jim ...

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, CETEARETH-20, OLEYL ALCOHOL, POTASSIUM OLEATE, AMMONIUM HYDROXIDE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, OLETH-10, PERSEA GRATISSIMA OIL, SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE, SILICA, SODIUM SULFITE, PARFUM, TOLUENE-2,5-DIAMINE SULFATE, ASCORBIC ACID, TETRASODIUM EDTA, RESORCINOL, 2-AMINO-3-HYDROXYPYRIDINE, p-AMINOPHENOL, 2-AMINO-6-CHLORO-4-NITROPHENOL

title: NEGOVALNA BARVNA KREMA, 58 MEDENA, CHARM, SUBRINA, 50 ML
